segments.text: It rumored that Jean is fooling around with another woman's husband .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You gossip ! What's the basis of your opinion ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Someone declared that he saw it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't believe it . Jean is such a kind lady . How could she do this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who knows ? You can't judge a book by its cover .
segments.speaker: S1
